        o (last v)
        n (->> v (partition 2 1) (map (fn [[x y]] (+' x y))))
        r (vec (flatten [a n o]))]
    (cons v (lazy-seq (pascal r)))))

(fn pascals-trapezoid [init]
  (let [calc (fn [coll] (loop [[head & tail] coll
                               res [head]]
                          (if (empty? tail)
                            (conj res head)
                            (recur tail (conj res (+' head (first tail))))
                            )))]
    (lazy-seq (cons init (lazy-seq (pascals-trapezoid (calc init))))))
  )

        pt (fn y [x] (cons x (lazy-seq (y (next-line x)))))]

(fn p-t [coll]
        (letfn [(p [ret c]
                   (if (= 1 (count c))
                       (concat (vector (first coll)) ret c)
                     (recur (conj ret (+ (bigint (first c)) (bigint (second c)))) (rest c))))]
               (concat [coll] (lazy-seq (p-t (p [] coll))))))

        (iterate row-builder xs)))

(fn p-trap ([s] (lazy-seq (cons s (p-trap s (first s) (last s)))))
  ([s l r] 
   (loop [left (first s) right (last s) orig s]
     (letfn  [( get-middle [s] (loop [remaining s cur []]
                                 (if (> (count remaining) 1)
                                   (let [next-sum (+' (first remaining) (second remaining))]
                                     (recur (rest remaining) (conj cur next-sum)))
                                   cur)))
              (prep-app-sides [s l r] 
                (vec (reverse (conj  (vec (reverse (conj s r))) l))))]

       (let [next-level (prep-app-sides (get-middle s) left right)] 
         (lazy-seq (cons next-level (p-trap next-level left right))))))))

(fn tr3 [coll]

    (letfn [(pt [n i]

               (= i n) l
               :else (+' (nth coll (- i 2)) (nth coll (dec i)))))]
      (cons coll (lazy-seq (tr3 (map #(pt n %) (range 1 (inc n)))))))))

                (if (= 1 (count v))
                  (conj v (first v))

                              (if (= 2 (count v-in))
                                (conj v-out (reduce +' v-in))
                                (recur (rest v-in) (conj v-out (reduce +' (take 2 v-in)))))
                              )]
      
                    (flatten [fst mdl lst])
                    ))
                ) v))

(fn p-zoid [initial]
  (let [
        next (fn [prev-line]
							  (cond 
							    (= 1 (count prev-line)) (concat prev-line prev-line)
							    (= 2 (count prev-line)) (let [[a b] prev-line] [a (+ a b) b])
							    :else (concat 
							            [(first prev-line)]
							            (for [index (range 0 (dec (count prev-line)))
								                  :let [
								                        x1 (bigint (nth prev-line index))
								                        x2 (bigint (nth prev-line (inc index)))
								                  ]] (+ x1 x2))
							            [(last prev-line)])))
        ]
  (concat [initial] (lazy-seq (p-zoid (next initial))))))
